member.name: PRJ_CALLBACK_DATA_FLAGS
member.summary: Flags controlling what is returned in the enumeration.

member.name: PRJ_CALLBACK_DATA_FLAGS.PRJ_CB_DATA_FLAG_ENUM_RESTART_SCAN
member.summary: Start the scan at the first entry in the directory.

member.name: PRJ_CALLBACK_DATA_FLAGS.PRJ_CB_DATA_FLAG_ENUM_RETURN_SINGLE_ENTRY
member.summary: Return only one entry from the enumeration.
